roleset.name: description of the growth rate when x is the first measurement, and each new iteration multiplies the previous measurement against x

role.descr: the exponent(number of times arg3 is multiplied by itself)
the base (number multiplied by itself arg2 times)

example.name: exponential-j
example.text: Radioactive decay is exponential because the number of atomic nuclei breaking up at a given moment is proportional to the number of nuclei that actually exist at that moment .

propbank.arg: because the number of atomic nuclei breaking up at a given moment is proportional to the number of nuclei that actually exist at that moment

example.name: exponential-j
example.text: I really can not see why at any time the algorithm would need to store an amount of nodes in memory that is exponential to the length of the optimal ( shortest ) path .

propbank.arg: to the length of the optimal ( shortest ) path

roleset.note: EXPONENTIAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.
